name: Dextra
description:
Dextra

Dextra is a metroidvania-esque 2D platformer... at first. Traversing the world as Dextra, you can find leftover code and use it to change the game's genre which you can switch at will. From platformers to fighting games to first person shooters, utilize a variety of genres to traverse levels in uncouth ways and rescue your friend Sebastian from the mysterious forces controlling him.
